alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Lafayette; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 8:05PM CDT until September 07 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lafayette Parish in south central Louisiana... Northeastern Acadia Parish in southwestern Louisiana... South central St. Landry Parish in central Louisiana... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 805 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sunset, or near Opelousas, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lafayette, Opelousas, Scott, Rayne, Carencro, Church Point, Leonville, Broussard, Youngsville, Sunset, Duson, Grand Coteau, Cankton, Mire, Lawtell, and Branch. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 86 and 106. Interstate 49 between mile markers 1 and 19. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
